paper_abstract: We show that the q-Kneser graph qK(2k:k) (the graph on the k-subspaces of a 2k-space over GF(q), where two k-spaces are adjacent when they intersect trivially), has chromatic number q(k) + q(k-1) for k = 3 and for k < q log q - q. We obtain detailed results on maximal cocliques for k = 3.
paper_title: On the chromatic number of q-Kneser graphs
